item.title: Josh Shapiro Lies About Election Laws To Make Excuses For Counties Counting Invalid Ballots
item.description: Shapiro's misleading statement wasn't just a failure of leadership — it is a betrayal of the trust that voters place in their elected officials.

item.title: Report: Corporate America Would Rather Help Women Kill Their Babies Than Start A Family
item.description: Companies policies like abortion travel and IVF are more about extracting more work out of a female employee than protecting her ability to have child...

item.title: The SAVE Act Could Hit Filibuster Wall In New Republican-Led Senate
item.description: 'The Democrats are not into compromising on issues that will cost them power,' Rep. Glenn Grothman said of the election integrity bill.

item.title: How To Dispel The Lies Most Americans Believe About Abortion
item.description: Shawn Carney and Steve Karlen’s guide is a clear and concise roadmap for pro-lifers looking to defend their stance and win hearts for good.

item.title: Founder Of Breastfeeding Support Organization Resigns After Group Indulges Men’s ‘Chestfeeding’ Fantasies
item.description: One of the original founders of La Leche League resigned from the organization due to the inclusion of men in the organization’s mission.
